---
title: "About"
code-tools: true
---

This site hosts the *codebok* for the SWINNO-database, which is a database
of swedish innovations. For more information about the SWINNO project visit
[swedishinnovationdata.se](https://www.swedishinnovationdata.se).


This codebook is created using *Quarto*, and the source files behind the
structure are openly hosted on GitHub where anyone can make suggestions for
how to improve the codebook, hence *living*.

If you notice any mistakes or have suggestions for improvements, please
report the error or suggest using the "Edit this page" or "Report an issue"
links at the footer of every page.
